posts.post_title: SOLD 1911 T201 Double Folder Killian, Fitzpatrick
posts.post_content:
Hello Everyone,

I have this 1911 T201 Mecca Double Folder Killian/Fitzpatrick for sale.

Thanks for looking,

Joe
